TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The lightsabers are in "A new hope" style, both characters are side characters that you see for 15 minutes each and the camera is out of focus.

I wish to get the LEGO UCS Republic Gunship

Edited July 22, 2023 by Aerodynamic Kerbal
Nweh page

Granted. You go to gunshop and buy a gunship.

I wish for the 50th part of the story.

Granted. It leaves you on a cliffhanger and now you must wait for the 51st part of the story! 

I wish that the clone troopers got the treatment they deserved, especially during the days of the Empire.

Granted, the clone trooper program was shut down by yoda before the clones could be made thus never existing.

i wish master sifo dyas was not ever discovered

125007222023

Granted.  His name is kept out of all discussions about the clones.  Doesn't change the rest of the story, though.

I wish R2's memory would have been wiped at the same time as C3PO's.

Granted. We lose the original trilogy but we also lose the abhorrent mess that is the sequel trilogy. Instead we get more movies about Jar Jar Binks

i wish to see such a trilogy

125607222023

Granted. It's all about the Galactic Empire and how Darth Jar Jar Binks took over it, making the entire galaxy goofy

I wish Mace Windu killed Palpatine and Anakin never turned

Granted, and all is well until a clone trooper at the Republic canteen gets Order #66.

I wish for more The Clone Wars-style animated shows.

Granted, they are ALL about Jar Jar Binks! Remember there has NEVER EVER been a canonical death for your favorite Gungan!

I wish that theyd stop writing poor female characters like rey.

165507222023

Granted. Rey has found a wallet, now she is rich.

I wish the Ewoks were eating eucalipt leaves.

Granted. They became fat. So fat, that in fact they were helpless against stormtroopers, thus destroying the Death Star II was a failure.

I wish Jar Jar Binks was force sensitive

Granted. Every time he feels the Force nearby, he starts scratching and vomiting.

I wish for a jar-jar of binks.

Granted. https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Gungan_stew

I wish to watch clone troopers in action without Jedi stealing the show.

Granted, you are conscripted to fight against them

i wish for rain

145607232023

Edited July 23, 2023 by AlamoVampire

Granted.  A new volcano forms in your living room, and it rains fire and lava in your house.

I wish to own 1 share of stock in Wal-Mart.

Granted. You go to Wal-Mart and share your smartphone Wi-Fi.

I wish for better moons around the Earth.

Granted. The sea level rises and we all die

I wish Disney released another non-main story Star Wars film (like Rogue one)

Granted. The Rogue One sequel. Two charred skeletons are sitting around on the glassy coast of the former sea... Two hours later one of them drops his jaw.

I wish the SW cookquel.

Spoiler

Granted you watch Cooking the Hutt the Clove Wars

i wish the user below me makes a bad joke about Cooking the Hutt the Clove Wars

141707242023

Granted. "Gonk-don Ramsey."

I wish for a clone trooper ration kit.

Granted. They feed you through the pipe in the nose. That's how it works. Why, do you think, they are so desperate attackers?

I wish to finish this phrase.

Granted: You did but forgot.

I wish that Monty Python had said: Nobody expects the Jedi Inquisition!

Granted: but he forgor to come so a random dude off the street said it
i wish that nobody gives me a trash wish because i want to be happy

Granted. It's happy before it gets corrupted.

I wish Laythe wasn't directly in Jool's inner radiation belts, completely destroying my dreams of a permanent Laythe colony.

Granted, Laythe is now inside Jool.

i wish for happy

001207282023

Edited July 28, 2023 by AlamoVampire
